title: Build a Tip Calculator
description: Use HTML/CSS/JS to build a simple tip calculator. Bonus: make it mobile-friendly.

title: Fetch Jokes from API
description: Create a joke app that fetches jokes using an API and displays them.

title: Flexbox Blog Layout
description: Design a basic blog layout using Flexbox only. Try to make it responsive.

title: To-Do CLI App in Python
description: Build a command-line to-do list using Python and file storage.

title: Personal Portfolio Page
description: Create your own portfolio site with your name, projects, and contact info.
